title: [Champion Idea] Brick Wall
body:
**[Passive]: **The brick wall champion cannot attack, or buy AP and AD items. Enemies cannot pass through this champion, and the champion gains 6.4 gold per second to make up for lack of CSing

**[Q]:** The brick wall champion rotates itself. The cooldown is  40/30/20/10/5 seconds. Note, that the brick wall cannot go through terrain or other such objects. CDR effects this ability

**[W]: **The brick wall channels for 3 seconds, granting himself a shield that lasts for 5 seconds. The shield blocks 500/600/750/950 damage. Scales with 10% Maximum Hp. 1 minute cooldown.

**[E]:** The brick wall gains movement speed for 10 seconds. Increased bonus movement speed of 1%/2%/4%/6%/10%. Cooldown of 10 seconds. Scales with 2% Armour and 2% Magic Resistance.

**[R]: **The brick wall becomes untargetable, and blocks a single lane or major objective (dragon pit or baron pit)  for 10/25/40 seconds.

Base width: Half a lane. Gains +10 units width per level.

**Concept: **The concept for this champion idea was to create another dimension of gameplay in both casual and competitive scenes. These mechanics promote positioning and teamwork to help coordinate each ability to its maximum capability. These abilities help ensure teamwork and positioning are heavily focused, especially during teamfights and objectives.

**Default Skin:** Red Brick Wall
**Potential Paid Skins:** Prison Bars (Legendary), Barbed Wire Fence(Epic), Cobbled Stone Fence (Epic)
